+000006c0: 6973 2061 2073 696d 706c 6520 7765 622d  is a simple web-
+000006d0: 6261 7365 6420 696e 7465 7266 6163 6520  based interface 
+000006e0: 666f 7220 7363 616e 6e65 7273 2e20 4974  for scanners. It
+000006f0: 2061 6c6c 6f77 7320 7368 6172 696e 6720   allows sharing 
+00000700: 7468 6520 7363 616e 6e65 7220 7669 6120  the scanner via 
+00000710: 4950 2061 6464 7265 7373 2c20 6d61 6b69  IP address, maki
+00000720: 6e67 2069 7420 6163 6365 7373 6962 6c65  ng it accessible
+00000730: 2062 7920 7468 6520 7765 6220 6272 6f77   by the web brow
+00000740: 7365 722e 2054 6865 2066 726f 6e74 656e  ser. The fronten
+00000750: 6420 696e 7465 7266 6163 6520 616c 6c6f  d interface allo
+00000760: 7773 2075 7365 7273 2074 6f20 6372 6f70  ws users to crop
+00000770: 2074 6865 2069 6d61 6765 2061 6e64 2062   the image and b
+00000780: 726f 7773 6520 7072 6576 696f 7573 6c79  rowse previously
+00000790: 2073 6361 6e6e 6564 2069 6d61 6765 732e   scanned images.
+000007a0: 0a0a 4672 6f6d 2061 2074 6563 686e 6963  ..From a technic
+000007b0: 616c 2070 6572 7370 6563 7469 7665 2c20  al perspective, 
+000007c0: 6974 2069 7320 7369 6d70 6c79 2061 2053  it is simply a S
+000007d0: 414e 4520 7363 616e 696d 6167 6520 7772  ANE scanimage wr
+000007e0: 6170 7065 722e 2054 6865 7265 2061 7265  apper. There are
+000007f0: 2071 7569 7465 206d 616e 7920 7468 696e   quite many thin
+00000800: 6773 2074 6f20 646f 2074 6f20 6d61 6b65  gs to do to make
+00000810: 2069 7420 7072 6f64 7563 7469 6f6e 2028   it production (
+00000820: 7365 6520 544f 444f 2073 6563 7469 6f6e  see TODO section
+00000830: 292e 0a0a 2323 2052 6571 7569 7265 6d65  )...## Requireme
+00000840: 6e74 730a 0a2d 204c 696e 7578 0a2d 2053  nts..- Linux.- S
+00000850: 414e 4520 2853 6361 6e6e 6572 2041 6363  ANE (Scanner Acc
+00000860: 6573 7320 4e6f 7720 4561 7379 2920 7072  ess Now Easy) pr
+00000870: 6f70 6572 6c79 2063 6f6e 6669 6775 7265  operly configure
+00000880: 6420 2860 7363 616e 696d 6167 6560 2074  d (`scanimage` t
+00000890: 6f6f 6c29 0a2d 2050 7974 686f 6e20 3e3d  ool).- Python >=
+000008a0: 2033 2e38 0a2d 205b 4f70 7469 6f6e 616c   3.8.- [Optional
+000008b0: 6c79 5d20 4e50 4d20 2866 6f72 2066 726f  ly] NPM (for fro
